metadata.synopsis: A one-liner dialog for a halfling musician who plays violin for a dancing show in Sharess Caress'.
metadata.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_A, Sharess Caress', taproom, stage room

0.speaker: Monsieur Chapeau
0.text: I know my fingering is immaculate, but you can compliment me afterwards.

1.speaker: Monsieur Chapeau
1.text: Enjoy the fiddling? Throw a few coins our way, and let us play on into the night!
